select res.res_name, nvl(rer.res_com,'이력없음') as res_com, nvl(rer.res_start,'이력없음') as res_start , nvl(rer.res_end,'이력없음') as res_end, nvl(rer.res_period,'이력없음') as res_period from member mem join resrecord rer on rer.m_id = mem.m_id join resume res on res.res_num = rer.res_num where rer.m_id = #{param1}

select * from (select ROWNUM r , N.* from (select * from reguloffr where m_id = #{param2} and alarm is null) N) where r between 1 + (#{param1} - 1) * 10 and 10 + (#{param1} - 1) * 10

select mem.M_ID, mem.J_CODE, mem.B_VEHICLENUM , mem.M_NAME, j.J_NAME, mde.M_ADDR, mde.M_DADDR, mde.M_EMAIL, mde.M_BIRTH, mde.M_PHONE, mde.M_ANNUAL, mde.M_REGDATE, mde.M_LICENSE, mde.M_PHOTO, mde.M_RESUME, o.O_DATE from member mem join mdetail mde on mem.m_id = mde.m_id join reguloff reg on reg.m_id = mem.m_id join moff o on o.O_CODE = reg.O_CODE join job j on j.J_CODE = mem.J_CODE where mem.m_id =#{m_id}

select mem.M_ID, mem.J_CODE, mem.B_VEHICLENUM , mem.M_NAME, j.J_NAME, mde.M_ADDR, mde.M_DADDR, mde.M_EMAIL, mde.M_BIRTH, mde.M_PHONE, mde.M_ANNUAL, mde.M_REGDATE, mde.M_LICENSE, mde.M_PHOTO, mde.M_RESUME from member mem join mdetail mde on mem.m_id = mde.m_id join job j on j.J_CODE = mem.J_CODE where mem.m_id =#{m_id}

select mem.M_ID,mem.M_NAME, o.O_DATE, memm.M_ID as m_id1,memm.M_NAME as m_name1, offo.O_DATE as o_date1, rofr.RO_REQDATE,rofr.RO_REGDATE, ko.KO_NAME from REGULOFFR rofr join member mem on mem.M_ID = rofr.M_ID join member memm on memm.M_ID = rofr.RO_OBJECT join moff o on o.O_CODE = rofr.O_CODE join moff offo on offo.o_code = rofr.ro_code join koff ko on ko.KO_CODE = rofr.KO_CODE where mem.m_id = #{m_id}
